import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const events = [ { name: 'Garba Night', date: 'Sept 17', location: 'Monibi', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1516450360452-9312f5e86fc7?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', }, { name: 'Music Festival', date: 'Oct 5', location: 'Bangalore', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1464983953574-0892a716854b?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', }, { name: 'Comedy Club', date: 'Oct 20', location: 'DeMi', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506744038136-46273834b3fb?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', }, ]; const whyChooseUs = [ { icon: '📈', title: 'Dynamic Pricing for Sellers', description: 'Get the best resale price based on demand' }, { icon: '✅', title: 'Verified Listings', description: '100% real tickets, no scams' }, { icon: '⚡', title: 'Instant Transfers', description: 'Get your ticket in seconds' }, { icon: '💰', title: 'Fair Fees', description: 'Lowest transaction fees in the market' }, { icon: '🇮🇳', title: 'Built for India', description: 'We support UPI, Paytm, and more' } ]; const howItWorks = [ { icon: '🔍', title: 'Find tickets to sold-out events', step: 'Buy' }, { icon: '🎫', title: 'List your tickets in minutes', step: 'Sell' }, { icon: '💳', title: 'Receive your ticket instantly', step: 'Get Ticket' } ]; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const [hoveredCard, setHoveredCard] = useState(null); return (
